banner.info: Play, Create, Own, and Govern a virtual world made by players

nftModule.title: NFT’S
nftModule.paragraph1: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

landModule.title: CREATE IN YOUR OWN LAND
landModule.paragraph1: A LAND is a piece of The Sandbox metaverse based on the ERC-721 smart contract that you can buy and use to create game experiences utilizing Sandbox’s digital ASSETs (ERC-1155).

sandModule.title: WHY SAND?
sandModule.paragraph1: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

aboutUs.theSandboxDescription: The Sandbox is a virtual world built on the Ethereum blockchain, where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences.
aboutUs.sandDescription: The SAND token is an ERC-20 utility token that is used for value transfers as well as staking and governance.
aboutUs.title1: Current products on The Sandbox platform include:
aboutUs.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain using the platform’s utility token SAND.Players can create digital assets in the form of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), upload them to the marketplace, and integrate into games with Game Maker.
aboutUs.paragraph2: A LAND is a digital piece of real estate in The Sandbox metaverse that players can buy to build experiences on top of. Once player owns a piece of LAND, the player will be able to populate it with games and ASSETS. Multiple LANDs can be combined to form an ESTATE.
aboutUs.paragraph3: A total of 166,464 LANDs will ever be available, contained in a map that will form The Sandbox metaverse.
aboutUs.paragraph4: GEM and CATALYST defines the tier, scarcity, and attributes of ASSET. CATALYST adds empty sockets to the NFTs that can be filled with GEMs. The higher the quality of the CATALYST, the more sockets your ASSET will have.
aboutUs.paragraph5: Users can monetize their time on the platform, keeping 95% of SAND as revenue share by:
aboutUs.paragraph6: Through the use of ERC-1776, The Sandbox allows platform users to initate transactions on the Ethereum blockchain while transaction gas fees are paid by the platform, optimizing overall user experience.
aboutUs.paragraph7: 50% of all SAND transaction volume, collected from LAND sales, Premium NFT sales, transaction fees and subscription services is going to the Foundation
aboutUs.paragraph8: The Foundation supports the ecosystem of The Sandbox, contributing to the growth of awareness about NFTs, Metaverse, and $SAND adoption.
aboutUs.subtitle1: The Foundation currently is involved with

list1.title3: Building Games on the Game Maker
list1.text1: Users can create and sell ASSETS on the marketplace as NFTs.
list1.text2: Buy a LAND in one of the LAND sales. Players can then rent them or populate them with content to increase the LAND's value.
list1.text3: Build and monetize games using the Game Maker on the LANDs that are owned by players.

list2.text1: Managing the Game Makers Fund and Creators Fund, offering grants to incentivize high quality content and game production in The Sandbox.
list2.text2: Funcing over 17 game projects, some of which have been unveiled to the public at https://www.sandbox.game/game/top
list2.text3: Distributing grants to 100 artists to produce NFTs, most of which can be seen at http://www.sandbox.game/shop
list2.text4: Supporting local community managers to grow awareness around the globe about The Sandbox, NFTs and blockchain gaming via our Community Rewards and Ambassadors program https://medium.com/sandbox-game/the-sandbox-ambassador-program-4f00bb5c9c24
list2.text5: Sponsoring prizes to the various contests organized by The Sandbox team (VoxEdit Contests and Game Jams) to stimulate the creativity of users around the world and get them to engage with the tools of our platform.
list2.text6: Supporting play-to-earn tournaments and cross-gaming with activities that encourage the broader adoption of SAND.

list3.description1: Software to create voxel ASSETS, which can then become Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and be imported to the Marketplace.
list3.description2: A decentralized marketplace for trading in-game ASSETS created in VoxEdit.
list3.description3: A visual scripting toolbox that allows anyone to build 3D games for free.

products.paragraph1: The Sandbox platform consists of three integrated products that together provide a comprehensive experience for the production of User-Generated Content (UGC). The Sandbox further benefits users by allowing them to secure copyright ownership of UGC through the implementation of NFT standards.
products.paragraph2: VoxEdit is a 3D voxel modeling package that allows users to create and animate 3D objects such as people, animals, foliage, and tools. Voxels, which are the equivalent of square 3D pixels similar to building blocks, can be manipulated using VoxEdit to easily create ASSETS.
products.paragraph3: The Sandbox’s Marketplace allows users to upload, publish, and sell their ASSETS made in VoxEdit. ASSETS are first uploaded into an InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) network and then registered on the Ethereum blockchain to prove ownership. ASSETS can be sold by making a sale offer on the Marketplace.
products.paragraph4: The Sandbox's Game Maker allows players to build 3D games for free. With the help of visual scripting tools, no coding knowledge is required.
products.paragraph5: The Sandbox platform currently runs exclusively on Ethereum, which is used to record the ownership of tokens and allow owners to transfer, sell, or use them without restrictions. IPFS is used to store all related information of ASSETS, and ensures that this information cannot be changed without the permission from respective owners.
products.paragraph6: The ERC-20 standard is used for the SAND, GEM, and CATALYST tokens, while ERC-1155 and ERC-721 standards are used for the storage and trading of LAND and ASSETS.
products.paragraph7: An overview of the overall Sandbox architecture is shown below:
products.paragraph8: The Sandbox's game engine is built on top of Unity. By using Unity's Universal Render Pipeline (URP), The Sandbox will be able to support mobile platforms in the future, without sacrificing the quality of the game. The game engine also supports custom Voxel models, rigging, and animation formats (VXM, VXR, VXA) from VoxEdit.

economics.subtitle3: Token governance and use of funds
economics.paragraph1: As of writing, The Sandbox team has used approximately 65.00% of funds raised according to the allocations below:
economics.paragraph2: The SAND token has the following use cases:

list3.text1: Players can potentially collect SAND through gameplay, and subsequently spend SAND to play games, purchase equipment, or customize Avatar characters. Creators can spend SAND to acquire ASSETS and LAND. Artists can spend SAND to upload ASSETS to the Marketplace and buy GEMs for defining item rarity.
list3.text2: SAND allows holders to participate in governance decisions. SAND owners can vote themselves or delegate voting rights to other players of their choice.
list3.text3: Users can stake SAND tokens to earn rewards, as well as GEMs and CATALYSTs for ASSETS creation.

mapLoader.text10: GEMS are the tokens that define your ASSETS attributes just as Power and Defense
mapLoader.text11: Did you know? The Creator Fund’s artists are responsible for creating the ASSETS in The Sandbox.
mapLoader.text12: You can create and sell your own ASSETS using VoxEdit, our free voxel editor.

gems.step1: Choose a Behaviour for your asset
gems.step2: It defines how the asset behaves in-game.
gems.step3: This is the suggested Catalyst for your asset.
gems.step4: Catalysts define the Tier of your asset.
gems.step5: The higher the Tier, the more sockets.
gems.step6: They also define the amount of copies created.
gems.step7: You can change the Catalyst used here.
gems.step8: Catalysts can be socketed with Gems.
gems.step9: Each Gem gives a different attribute to your asset.
gems.step10: Click or Drag & Drop to add Gems to the Catalyst.
gems.step11: The more Gems of the same type, the more points of the attribute you get.
gems.step12: Click or Drag & Drop to remove Gems from the Catalyst.

OnboardingMap.subtitle: Welcome to the
OnboardingMap.title: Sandbox Map
OnboardingMap.slide02: Navigate the Sandbox map to find the LANDS and ESTATES of our upcoming playable metaverse. Make sure to set your wallet with SAND to get yourself a piece of the Sandbox.
OnboardingMap.slide03: We are holding a series of special lunar-themed LAND presales beginning this June 4th through July 2nd. Get a hold of one of the 7,254 LANDS of this MoonSale at a 20% discount and get ready to join the metaverse.

onSale.readText: Read the whole article in our Medium channel.
onSale.text: During the ASSET Presale, you will be able to buy exclusive ASSETS to be used in your LANDS.
onSale.leftText: An ASSET is a voxel model made by artists for The Sandbox using Voxedit. ASSETS are user-generated content (UGC) uploaded on the blockchain as NFTs. ASSETS are game items you can buy to later incorporate into your LAND.

tksRegisteringWallet: Thanks for pre-registering! We’ll notify you when it becomes available.
fillUp: In the meantime, make sure you fill-up your wallet!

whitelistSignup.message: Thank you for registering your wallet. We will notify you once SAND is available for sale.

shop.title: Welcome to the Shop
shop.subtitle: The SHOP is The Sandbox marketplace, where you can select and buy creator’s ASSETS with SAND to incorporate them into your LAND
shop.noResults: No items found for this search.

create.description: Create your own voxel models, rig them, and animate them in no time.

modeler.title: Modeler
modeler.text: Make the most of your creativity! From beginners to experts, anyone can make amazing creations thanks to our robust set of tools and our user-friendly interface.

animator.title: Animator
animator.text: A game changer in the voxel creation world. With our Skeleton System, VoxEdit allows you to rig and animate anything that you want using the timeline via an easy-to-use keyframing mode.

blockEditor.title: Block Editor
blockEditor.text: Section to create the fundamental building blocks of the SandBox 3! Each block measures 32 voxels, there are Solid or Liquid blocks with inner properties.

quotes.title: Quotes from voxel artists
quotes.text1: “VoxEdit has impressed me, since it's the fusion of a modeling editor with an animation system all in the same software.”
quotes.text2: “VoxEdit is a game changer for voxel artists looking to animate, being the only dedicated voxel editor that features skeletal rigging and timeline animation.”
quotes.text3: “It shows some excellent promise in the direction it's going with a dedicated team. Adding a full functioning animation system within the editor makes it stand out from the rest!”
quotes.text4: “One of the easiest tools to create animations in voxel art, with an attractive and a very simple easy-to-use interface for beginners.”

step01.text: In order to upload your models, you need to become an artist through our Creator Fund.

step02.text: VoxEdit is the only software capable of exporting assets to our Marketplace. Download VoxEdit and start creating.

step03.text: Once you finished your model you can export it to the Marketplace following these simple steps.

section1.description1: Quickly combine different outfits, hairstyles and colors to get a unique look.
section1.description2: Meet with friends and socialize with thousands of players in The Sandobx virtual world.
section1.description3: Boost your attributes with equipment and get ready to play.

section2.title: Select an Avatar
section2.description1: Find your own style to stand out from the crowd
section2.description2: Get started easily with a predesigned avatar. Choose between more than 20 models designed by our best artists and join The Sandbox metaverse!

section3.title: Customize your Avatar
section3.description: Quickly combine different outfits, hairstyles and colors to create a unique style

section4.title: Socialize into the virtual world
section4.description1: Meet and interact with thousands of users with different styles. Explore, discover and play with them in the virtual lands of The Sandbox.
section4.description2: Become who you truly are: the possibilities are endless.

section5.title: Boost your Avatar’s attributes with Equipment
section5.subtitle: Coming soon.

part1.title: Equip your avatar and get special skills.
part1.description1: All avatars come with a specific set of Attributes that define their abilities in The Sandbox Game Maker: Power, Luck, Defense, Speed and Magic.
part1.description2: Want a stronger avatar? Visit the marketplace and choose the right weapon from thousands of options created by the Community. They will soon become available.

part2.title: Create custom Equipment with VoxEdit
part2.description: Equipment are Tokens that can be traded. They have Catalysts, Rarity and Gems just as other assets do. Yes, you can also create and mint Equipment through VoxEdit!

section6.title: What are you waiting for?
section6.description: Join the Community of thousands of users that have already registered in TheSandbox with their unique avatars.

assetInfo.finalDisclaimer: This system remains flexible both for creators (allowing them to tweak their Games at will) and for players (not restricting Game access, but giving more or less bonuses).

header.title: WHAT IS SAND?
header.text: SAND is the utility token used throughout The Sandbox ecosystem as the basis of transactions and interactions. It is an ERC-20 utility token built on the Ethereum blockchain. There is a finite supply of 3,000,000,000 SAND.

gettingStarted.title: Getting to know SAND in The Sandbox

section1.title: What is The Sandbox?
section1.text: The Sandbox is a community-driven game ecosystem that empowers game makers to create, publish, and monetize unique experiences on a decentralized platform with a cryptocurrency economy based on the SAND token.

section2.title: What is SAND used for?
section2.text: SAND will be used across The Sandbox ecosystem by gamers, developers, and publishers to buy, sell and earn. There are many use cases for SAND including the ability to:

list.itm1: Buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS
list.itm2: Provide rewards for creators, game makers, and LAND holders

section3.title: How can I get SAND?
section3.text: SAND is not for sale yet. In the future, you will be able to buy SAND directly on our dashboard and on various exchanges.

goMap.title: Find your LAND and navigate through the biomes of The Sandbox map

step1.title: Choose a method of your preference
step1.text: You can choose FIAT as your payment option with any of the following credit cards:

step2.title: Send ETH to your wallet
step2.text: We run on the Ethereum blockchain so you can choose to opt to exchange some Ether and from a wallet in order to get SAND, we support the following ones:

step3.title: Get SAND
step3.text: With everything ready to begin, you can now choose between the thousand of amazing NFTs on our Marketplace or own a piece of The Sandbox world by getting a LAND.

buy.invalidNetwork: Invalid network, please change to one of the following:

theGame.title: COME PLAY IN THE METAVERSE!
theGame.text: Prepare to meet new friends in an imaginative gaming metaverse: The Sandbox will open soon

play.title: Play Millions of games
play.text: The Sandbox is one of the largest user-generated content game platform, offering a myriad of player-made gaming experiences that will immerse avatar into one the most social & multiplayer experience!

create.title: Create your own adventures
create.text: The Sandbox allows you to use thousands of voxel models made by the community: assemble them, create your own universe, invent stories ... and dive in with your friends! Create your maps, or discover other player’s worlds!

share.title: Share with other players
share.text: Import your models, create a map, invent stories, hide some secrets, place wildlife… and let people play in your world! Get inspired by the incredible diversity available on the ASSET store - and by what other players create.

earn.title: Play-to-Earn
earn.text: Free-to-play is so 2010… With The Sandbox, you will be able to monetize the games you create! Play-to-Earn is unlocked through our rewarding model for players and creators, who will have strong incentives to play and create with rewards that have real-world value.
earn.listTitle: How to earn in The Sandbox?

list.item01: Play GAMES, earn rewards

minimum.title: Minimum
minimum.text: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space

recommended.title: Recommended
recommended.text: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space

list.item01: Design and build your environment: place items, buildings and creatures in your LAND. Customize their behavior and add gameplay bricks to create the ultimate game experience.
list.item02: Use our simple drag and drop level builder to place Entities that come with ready-to-use templates of fun behaviors
list.item03: Refine Entities and ITEMS using an intuitive visual scripting editor
list.item04: Or write your own custom scripts to create even more unique interactions within your game experiences
list.item05: Press play to see your creation come to life then share your world, and change it at your will.
list.item06: In The Sandbox YOU write the rules of the game!

list.item01: The Sandbox is one of the largest user-generated content game platforms
list.item02: Discover a myriad of player-made gaming experiences including social & multiplayer experiences!
list.item03: Tour a Metaverse composed of thousands of experiences and games
list.item04: Visit LANDS from Partners including renowned game studios and brands
list.item05: Choose and customize your Avatar before setting out to explore the Metaverse
list.item06: Invite friends to your LAND and build a spectacular diorama together using our co-building features
list.item07: Play with other Players; fight them in PvP battles or party together through social events.
list.item08: Get ready to go social! Organize virtual meetups, invite your friends and chat with visitors at your desired location

participate.title: Participate in the governance o the Metaverse

list.item01: Take control over key decisions and the future of The Sandbox Metaverse by voting using your SAND tokens.
list.item02: Everyone can rate experiences shared in the Metaverse. The best ones will be hosted on The Sandbox’s reserved domain for maximum visibility, so be creative!
list.item03: As an owner, you can open your LAND to visitors or keep it secret. Organize contests to display your creations or rent your space to other creators; the possibilities for creativity and commerce are endless.

list.item01: Better game feel and upgraded movements, capacity to wear a sword and use it to fight
list.item02: Your avatar is now a real ninja!

list.item01: The enemies detect you and will attack the avatar or other entities if set to it. They will also restore their health before attacking you again so be sure to be quick!
Create your mini-games setting victory or game over conditions, with a time limit, pickable items and reward -build some quests to improve your experience and share it to players

When starting your experience and deciding the size of your experiences, you can now pick a specific biome to thematize it (desert, snow, nature…) or even start with a flat tile to build from scratch -by popular demand
To offer new possibilities within the objective system (local save only)
To help you visualize in a glimpse your most precious assets in The Sandbox world
Behaviors upgrade for quicker interactions
list.item02: Live Sync to have a better flow between the Game Maker and the assets on the dashboard
list.item03: Terraforming tool preview and multiple selections to ease your building experience
list.item04: Save file size optimization and land loading improvement

item04.title: Closed Alpha v0.3
item04.subtitle: We’ve got a whole slew of changes for you in this release, including new features, combat changes, and UI revamps. Let’s take a look at what’s new:

list.item01: Create and Publish your maps and experiences in the Game Maker for everyone to see and play in the Experience Gallery.
list.item02: Visit our featured The Sandbox experiences created by our artists and designers.
list.item03: Play and Rate others’ experiences. Give a star to your favorite experiences.

list.item01: Presets allow you to create, configure, and store an asset with all its modified content, including logic parameters, all properties and values & child assets.
list.item02: Presets act as templates from which creators can create new preset instances in the Game Maker.

list.item01: Improved Jump and Dodge mechanics.
list.item02: Added an auto-targeting system to focus the Avatar attacks onto an enemy.
list.item04: Incoming attacks are now easier to identify through new enemy indicators.
list.item05: Added Heavy and Thrust attack types into the game.
list.item06: Added new VFX and animations for the Avatar, Enemies, and other entities.

list.item01: Improved UI on the Quest Tracker includes improved graphic assets and animations.
Improved enemy behaviors and pathfinding systems.
We’ve temporarily disabled 3x3 and 4x4 experiences as the team is working on resolving some issues related to them
list.item02: For experiences saved using previous versions, image thumbnails won’t load in the Experience Gallery until they are opened and saved in this new version.
list.item03: Victory condition shows all the quests at the same time.
list.item04: Some quests can't be completed when you do the tasks previous to talking to the person that gives them, possibly blocking the advancement.
list.item05: The Default Avatar when playing an experience without an Avatar asset doesn’t have the proper animations.

list.item01: We’ve added the possibility to select your own Avatar to play experiences in game.
list.item02: Users will be able to access the Avatar creator website, log into their accounts and select the Avatar they want to use to play and create experiences.
list.item03: Select from 28 different preset Avatars to use on the Game Maker.

list.item01: Added improvements on the flow and UI to make it more understandable for users on how to publish an experience into the Gallery.
list.item02: Added pop-ups and messages indicating possible errors users may encounter while publishing an experience.
list.item03: Added featured experiences published by the TSB team.

list.item01: Improved game stability and performance issues.
list.item02: Fixed some experiences not being able to be opened due to retrocompatibility issues.

list.item01: We’ve temporarily disabled 3x3 and 4x4 experiences as the team is working on resolving some issues related to them.
list.item02: For experiences saved using previous versions, image thumbnails won’t load in the Experience Gallery until they are opened and saved in this new version.
list.item03: Victory condition shows all the quests at the same time.
list.item04: Some quests can't be completed when you do the tasks previous to talking to the person that gives them, possibly blocking the advancement.

list.item01: We’ve implemented our first instance of Multiplayer gameplay into the game.
list.item02: Inside the Experience Gallery you’ll find an experience called “Social Park” which is featured on our list.
list.item03: Visiting the experience will enable Multiplayer mode, where you’ll be able to explore the experience and chat with other players.
list.item04: As this is a Social Hub, combat controls will be disabled.

item01.title: Pre-Alpha
item01.text01: First stage of the terraforming tools
item01.text03: Integration of the first behaviored entities
item01.text05: First Diorama features (doors, moving platforms, buttons, dialogs)

item02.title: Private Alpha
item02.text04: Release to selected creators of the GMF and landowners

downloadGame.title: THE SANDBOX IS COMING!
downloadGame.text: Create exciting new universes filled with gameplays and a large selection of models. Make your own models or import from the Marketplace to start creating your own voxel world to share with friends and the community!
downloadGame.loginToStart: Log in to start the Sandbox experience

overview.title: Create. Animate. Play
overview.subtitle: VoxEdit is the first software that allows you to create your own voxel models, rig them, and animate them in no time.

features.title: VoxEdit features
features.card1Text: Make the most of your creativity! From beginners to experts, anyone can make amazing creations thanks to our robust set of tools and our user-friendly interface.
features.card2Text: A game changer in the voxel creation world. With our Skeleton System, VoxEdit allows you to rig and animate anything that you want using the timeline via an easy-to-use keyframing mode.

downloadVoxEdit.title: WELCOME TO VOXEDIT
downloadVoxEdit.subtitle: VoxEdit is the first software that allows you to create your own voxel models, rig them and animate them in no time.

v-info.disclaimer1: VoxEdit requires the latest version of Java installed on your computer in order to run.
v-info.disclaimer2: If you want to learn more about VoxEdit you can check out our website:

found.subtitle: We want to help you create, share and sell YOUR amazing voxel creations on OUR platform:

principalList.item1: Free prime exposure for your creations in The Sandbox, one of the most anticipated online PC games of 2019
principalList.item2: Create, share and sell your voxel creations to game developers and players
principalList.item3: Keep full ownership and copyright of your creations
principalList.item4: Maintain creative freedom with art direction under your own control
principalList.item5: Learn how to create and sell NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain
principalList.item6: Be part of our creator community building a new gaming future

subtitle1List.item01: First, you'll sign up so we can evaluate your work, as we want to encourage the best voxel ASSETS
subtitle1List.item02: Grant payments will be on a per-asset basis, ranging from $10 to $1,000 per ASSET
subtitle1List.item03: Overall goal for the fund is to generate 10,000 voxel ASSETS for the game
subtitle1List.item04: In addition to the grant, you'll be able to sell your creations to players when The Sandbox launches

found.subtitle2: The program is limited to the first 1,000 artists accepted, so sign up today for a chance to enjoy the benefits!

guideline1.title: Eligibility
guideline1.text: The Sandbox's Creators Fund is an initiative supporting all talents without any distinction of age, gender or country of origin.

guideline2.title: What we are looking for in you

list.itm1: Creators who can produce both static and animated voxel ASSETS
list.itm2: Creators who can produce ASSETS that engage players in an interactive, game-oriented environment
list.itm3: Creators who exhibit artistic imagination throughout their work
list.itm4: Creators who thrive on an authentic working partnership with the players and developers who will buy and use their ASSETS
list.itm5: Creators who can assess not only the visual attraction of their ASSETS but their suitability for players and developers

guideline3.title: Copyright Ownership
guideline3.text: You retain all rights and ownership of your content. We do not claim any ownership rights to your content.

guideline4.title: Licensing Rights
guideline4.text: When you upload content to The Sandbox Marketplace, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, sub-incansable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, publicly display, distribute and adapt (so as to better showcase your content, for example), publicly perform, and translate the content as needed in response to user drive actions.

guideline5.title: In-Game Marketplace Exposure
guideline5.text: Receive prime exposure for free and a duration of 6 months, in the “Highlights” section of The Sandbox's Marketplace

list.itm2: 2. Read our Voxel Art Style Guidelines
list.itm4: 4. Use VoxEdit, our propietary voxel editor, to create and export the 3D models
list.itm5: 5. Agree to The Sandbox Creator Fund Artist Terms and Conditions

guideline7.title: Selection and Review Criteria
guideline7.text: The judges consist of The Sandbox Community Team. Here is what we will be reviewing:

list.itm1: Range and quality of the artist's work
list.itm2: Originality and suitability for use of ASSETS in interactive environments

guideline8.title: Asset Parameters
guideline8.text: Each ASSET shall be submitted to The Sandbox with the following attributes:

guideline10.title: Ethics/Motives
guideline10.text: The goal of this fund is to help and train Artists to publish your voxel creations on the blockchain as non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and learn more about the benefits from blockchain technology:

faq1.title: What will I be required to submit with my application form?
faq1.text: You will need to provide basic information on your identity and link us to your online portfolio. You can optionally provide up to three images with your submission, but this is not required.

faq2.title: Is my information kept private when I apply online?
faq2.text: The Sandbox will not release your information without your permission.

faq3.title: Can I submit ASSETS that I’ve created for previous projects or games?
faq3.text: Yes, as long as you own the copyright of these ASSETS and you have the full license rights to use them on other projects.

faq4.title: How much can I get in grants per ASSET?
faq4.text: The grant per ASSET can range from $10 to $1,000 depending on its scale and complexity.

faq5.title: How many ASSETS can I submit?

faq6.title: Can I sell ASSETS for which I’ve received a grant from the Creator Fund on other marketplaces?
faq6.text: Yes, you retain all rights and ownership of your Content and can sell them on other marketplaces. We will only request a nonexclusive permission to list the content on The Sandbox’s Marketplace.

faq7.title: How many total artists can be given grants under the Creator Fund?
faq7.text: Up to 1,000 artists can be given grants via the Creator Fund.

faq8.title: Do I lose the copyright for any ASSETS for which I receive a grant?
faq8.text: Artists retain all rights and ownership of your Content. We do not claim any ownership rights to your Content.

faq9.title: What are the licensing rights for ASSETS that I upload to The Sandbox?
faq9.text: When you upload Content to The Sandbox Marketplace, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, sub-licensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, publicly display, distribute and adapt (so as to better showcase your Content, for example), publicly perform, and translate the Content as needed in response to user drive actions.

principalSection.title: Voxelart Guidelines
principalSection.text: Here are some thoughts and processes, describing how to switch from pixelart to voxelart. It’s not meant to be the only way to do it, we hope this will give you ideas for creating your own way!

rulesSection.title: Play by the rules
rulesSection.text1: With great power comes great responsibility: the most important is to stay in tracks and compliant with our constraints!
rulesSection.text2: The default size is 32*32*32, which is translated to a Meter (3,2 f) on The Sandbox Universe, and therefore characters and ASSETS would have to be created having this measures as a reference. It is not necessary to use all of this detail, but 32x32x32 is the maximum detail available to make inside a cubic meter.
rulesSection.text3: Avatar creation : if a human character average height is 1,80 metres (5,9) on the game, his construction should be based on the height of two cubes of 32*32*32.

marketSection.title: Get your Assets ready for the Marketplace
marketSection.subtitle: Once you’re done modeling and texturing, prepare your assets for the marketplace!

hintsSection.title: Hints and Tips
hintsSection.subtitle: Let’s focus on some details from the scene.

tip1.title: Details
tip1.text: Adding volume to the overall texture is great - no need to overdo it, only use subtle variations here and there.

tip2.title: Textures
tip2.text: When texturing, keep in mind that the model should be readable from a distance. Keep it light, you can add worn-out effects (humidity, dark corners...) if wanted.

tip3.title: Faking light
tip3.text: I always found it usefull to add some light intention when texturing (painted shadows and highlights). This effect should be faint since we will already have lights and shadows in the renderer.

tip1.title: Diagonals
tip1.text: Try to keep diagonals as even as possible, with the same amount/ratio of blocks.

tip2.title: Large overall scale
tip2.text: Any detail added to the pattern of terrain cubes, would have to be added through the Atlas system

tip3.title: Textures #2
tip3.text: The squared pattern that was suggested in the pixel mockup can be reproduced here, and adds cohesion and readability to the models

tip1.title: Scale
tip1.text: A good way to determine the scale of any monster is to focus on their eye: a single dark dot for the pupil, a white one underneath to give it some toon aspect, and you’ve got your ratio.

tip2.title: Is it meant to be animated?
tip2.text: Parts that are meant to be animated, are different models that are 'linked' together when rigging a model in VoxEdit

tip1.title: Scale
tip1.text: It’s hard to keep things simple when modeling trees , more than any other nature props. This tortured tree has messy branches, but most of them should have large leaf blocks to keep them simple shaped

tip2.title: Details
tip2.text: Again, try to give your model some light intention coming from one way. Add quick details such as holes and roots.

tip1.title: Special effects
tip1.text: Lava and water tiles should be handled via the aforementioned Atlas system

tip2.title: Details
tip2.text: Again, try to give your model some light intention coming from one way. Add quick details such as holes and roots.

claimAssets.title: The Sandbox ft. The Smurfs
claimAssets.desc: As a way to thank our loyal community who’s been contributing to The Sandbox since the very beginning, we’ll be giving away 1 Smurf NFT to ALL LAND owners.

popUpSave.text2: Try it now in the Game Maker.

popUpNotSave.title: Hey! You forgot to save your Avatar
popUpNotSave.paragraph: If you leave this page, any changes you have made will be lost. Do you want to save your avatar before leaving?

popUpCreateAvatar.title: Your Sandbox Avatar
popUpCreateAvatar.paragraph: Combine different faces, shirts, pants and shoes and create your unique style!

oldVoxEdit.assetExported: The Asset was exported with an old VoxEdit version

carousel.info: Create your Avatar for The Sandbox!
carousel.info2: Customize your look, boost it with equipment and get ready to play with your friends in The Sandbox metaverse.
carousel.info3: The Sandbox is a community-driven platform where creators can monetize voxel ASSETS and gaming experiences on the blockchain
carousel.playInfo: Play, Create, Own, and Govern a virtual world made by players

voxEdit.title: VoxEdit
voxEdit.info: Create and animate voxel art. Export anywhere.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.info: One place to sell and collect the best ASSETS.

gameMaker.title: Game Maker
gameMaker.info: Make and Play any game that you can imagine.

sand.title: SAND
sand.info: Our cryptocurrency that fuels the game economy.

creatorFund.title: FUND
creatorFund.info: Get paid to create and share YOUR amazing voxel creations.

press.title: Press
press.info: Learn about our gaming platform, partnerships and roadmap.

first.title: NFTs
first.paragraph1: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

second.title: CREATE IN YOUR OWN LAND
second.paragraph1: A LAND is a piece of The Sandbox metaverse based on the ERC-721 smart contract that you can buy and use to create game experiences utilizing Sandbox’s digital ASSETs (ERC-1155).

third.title: WHY SAND?
third.paragraph1: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

titles.before: A LAND PRESALE IS COMING. PRE-REGISTER NOW
titles.during: THE LAND PRESALE IS LIVE. BUY LANDS NOW!
titles.next: Pre-register now for the next LAND presale!
titles.soldout: THE PRESALE IS SOLD OUT. Next round coming soon

presale.info2: Our metaverse contains 166,464 LANDS, and this presale allows investors to become early adopters of this limited commodity.

wathLand.title: What is a LAND?
wathLand.text1: A LAND is a digital piece of real estate in The Sandbox metaverse, a persistent 3D voxel universe created by players and secured through blockchain technology to give players a virtual playground.
wathLand.text2: You can buy a LAND to populate it with ASSETS and GAMES.
wathLand.text3: A total of 166,464 LANDS will ever be available, contained in a map that will form The Sandbox metaverse

landPacks.title: Stake your claim in The Sandbox game metaverse!
landPacks.subTitle: Two different parcel types are available on The Sandbox map:

lands.title: LAND
lands.info1: A LAND is the basic unit of the metaverse. Each LAND is sized at
lands.info2: meters in the game world enabling all types of game experiences.

estate.title: ESTATE
estate.info1: An ESTATE is the combination of multiple
estate.info2: Also called DISTRICT when owned by multiple players.

district.title: DISTRICT
district.info: A DISTRICT is a huge block of up to 441 LANDS in a 21x21 grid. Owners of a DISTRICT will have special governance rules that affect all the experiences within.

features.title: What can you do with a LAND?
features.organizeContestsInfo: games that you or others create

sand.title: SAND
sand.subtitle: Main utility token
sand.text: SAND is the main utility token.

land.title: LAND
land.subtitle: Part of metaverse
land.text: LANDS are portions of the metaverse open to player ownership.

asset.title: ASSET
asset.subtitle: Player created
asset.text: ASSETS are token created by the players (UGC).

gems.title: GEM
gems.subtitle: Burnt when used
gems.text: GEMS are tokens required to create scarce ASSETS.

games.title: GAME
games.subtitle: Asset/script bundle
games.text: Bundle of ASSETS and scripting logic forming an interactive experience.

topSection.textSandboxBrandPage: Thank you for your interest in spreading the word, you might find what you need below! If not, reach out to us at:

logoSection.textLogo: Do not edit, change, distort, color or reset the Sandbox Presskit
logoSection.textAlternativeLogo: Use them only when the Sandbox brand is clearly visible or correctly included elsewhere on the page or in the design. (In case of doubt, use the other one)

videosSection.videosDescription6: Make a Game with Atari NFTs

fullkitSection.fullkitText: Download the full SandBox press kit and get application icons, posters, logos and much more.

privacyPolicy.title: TSBMV Global Ltd. Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.text1: GDPR – Privacy-By-Design and Record of Processing Activities
privacyPolicy.text2: We are committed to a lawful, fair and transparent processing of personal data, adhering to the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).This privacy policy documents our general privacy-by-design considerations (articles 5, 25 and 26 GDPR) and records our processing activities (article 30(1) GDPR). This privacy policy describes the type of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the website
privacyPolicy.text3: , all platforms and services offered thereon, and through our mobile applications (collectively, our “Website”) and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
privacyPolicy.text4: Company name: TSBMV GLOBAL LTD.* Address: WB Corporate Services (Cayman) Ltd., P.O. Box 2775, Artemis House, 67 Fort Street, Grand Cayman, KY1-1111, Cayman Islands Personal Data Processings: Player data Creation date / last update: August 28, 2020 contact persons:*  Sebastien BORGET, contact@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text5: * Not formally a DPO under the GDPR. Note that the below uses the “you” and “us” pronouns in paragraphs nrs. 1 o 11 to allow inclusion without modification in our information notices provided to data subjects.
privacyPolicy.text6: Our Website is not intended for children under 18 years of age. No one under age 18 may provide any personal information to or on the Website. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are under 18, do not use or provide any information on this Website or on or through any of its features/register on the Website, make any purchases through the Website, use any of the interactive or public comment features of this Website or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, email address, or any screen name or user name you may use. If we learn we have collected or received personal information from a child under 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 18, please contact us at privacy@sandbox.game.
privacyPolicy.text7: 1. We process the following (categories of) personal data When you play our games, interact with or participate in our gaming platforms, connect to a social networking site through our games, register an account, enter a promo code, or place an order, we process the following personal data:
privacyPolicy.text8: Your IP address, your SIM code, and the country where you are located. Your device type (for example, PC or Mac, iPhone 7, Samsung Galaxy S7) and operating system version.
privacyPolicy.text9: For analytics, most, when you installed and played the game, your progress throughout the game, and events that are connected to your game-play. We generally cannot identify you with this data, but treat it the same as personal data.
privacyPolicy.text10: 2. What (purposes) do we use the data for We use this personal data to perform analytics for our games and allow third-parties to sell, buy and deliver advertising in those games that display advertising. We use your IP address and SIM code to comply with legal obligations, specifically to comply with VAT reporting obligations
privacyPolicy.text11: We use social network data to show you personalized content and synchronise your online progression across multiple devices. For example, we might show a list with only your friends in it, or show your name or avatar on an in-game object.
privacyPolicy.text12: We use your email address that you provided when you signed up for our newsletter to send you the newsletter
privacyPolicy.text13: 3. What is our legal basis for the processing For both analytics and advertising we base the processing of personal data on the legitimate interest of TSBMV GLOBAL LTD. For analytics, this is our ability to analyze how players progress through our games to make them better, and to know our player-base on an aggregate level. For advertising, this is our ability to be able to off-set development costs and risk with advertising income. We also process your personal data for the legitimate business interest of complying with a legal obligation -- we are subject to certain legal requirements which may require us to process your personal data. We may also be obliged by law to disclose your personal data to a regulatory body or law enforcement agency. For the third-parties we use, their legitimate interest is to be able to offer us their services, and for advertising third-parties and advertisers to be able to show you advertising.
privacyPolicy.text14: 4. Where do we obtain the data from (sources) We obtain data from you (when you provide it directly through the Website) and from our third-party services providers:
privacyPolicy.text19: 5. How long and where do we store data We store the personal data that we collect for up to 5 years, and only aggregate data after that time. Aggregation data means that we can no longer look at data for individual players. We store the data with our third-party services provider, Amazon AWS. When a third-party service provider is a controller, they may keep data as well, either for a shorter or longer period.
privacyPolicy.text20: 6. What safeguards have we taken to protect data Taking into account the nature, scope, context and purpose of the processing, we have taken the following technical and organizational measures:
privacyPolicy.text21: Access to our database and user accounts with third-party service providers is protected with access control.
privacyPolicy.text22: Access to the database is limited, not all staff in our organization have full access.
privacyPolicy.text23: Data sent from our games is encrypted in transit where technically possible. We do not actively monitor the security of our databases and need to rely on our processors to notify us of any data breaches.
privacyPolicy.text24: 7. Who we share data with We may disclose aggregated data and any information that does not identify an individual without restriction.
privacyPolicy.text25: We may also disclose personal information that we collect or you provide:
privacyPolicy.text27: To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business.
privacyPolicy.text28: To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, reorganization, dissolution, or other transfer or sale of some or all of TSBMV Global Ltd.’s assets.
privacyPolicy.text29: To fulfill the purposes for which you provide it.
privacyPolicy.text30: For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
privacyPolicy.text32: We share data with the following third-parties. These are either controllers, or processors acting on our behalf. We have linked to their respective policies and given a basic description of what they do:
privacyPolicy.text33: We may also disclose your personal information:
privacyPolicy.text34: To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
privacyPolicy.text35: To enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
privacyPolicy.text36: If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety or TSBMV Global Ltd., our end users, or others.
privacyPolicy.text37: 8. Transfer of your personal data You should also know that your personal data may be transferred from your home country to third parties. If you are an EU resident, this could imply that we also transfer data to countries that do not offer an adequate level of protection for your personal data. When we transfer this data, we will do so only when we have put in place appropriate safeguards to protect your personal data. Please contact us to get a copy of the safeguards that we have put in place. Our contact details are at the end of this privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.text38: 9. Your Rights You have the right to request access to your personal data that we process. You also have the right to:
privacyPolicy.text39: Rectify incorrect personal data or erase it in certain circumstances.
privacyPolicy.text40: Restrict or object to the processing of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.text41: Receive your data so that you can use it elsewhere (data portability).
privacyPolicy.text42: If you wish to exercise any of the above rights, please send us an email at privacy@sandbox.game. You may also update your personal data in your profile on The Sandbox via the settings. Finally, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. If you do not know who your supervisory authority is, please contact us and we will tell you.
privacyPolicy.text43: 10. How to contact us You can contact us with any questions you may have about the processing of your personal data or the use of cookies and similar technologies by us, or to exercise the above rights: Web: http://www.sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text44: Address: WB Corporate Services (Cayman) Ltd., P.O. Box 2775, Artemis House, 67 Fort Street, Grand Cayman, KY1-1111, Cayman Islands Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text45: 11. Version information: We last updated this notice on August 28, 2020. You can view it at
